::DevilDuer/Zardus/Panzertron::

DevilDuer frowns, seeing many disadvantages in letting this femm move in with 
the Alliance, even if it was temporary.

"I serioustly doubt its allright with Zardus, but I'll ask him," DevilDuer 
says, glaring at Lady Hawk.

He activates his comm-link, speaking into it, "Hey, Zardus, there's some femm 
named Lady Hawk here, in the name of science, so she says, and she wants to 
move into our base for a while. What me to kill 'er?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus walks through the halls of the Iron Fist, Panzertron explaining all of 
the functions to him. So far, he had grasped everything, and had seen how to 
put it to his advantage. Moving the Alliance here would be very rewarding. 
The only faction with an island base, and shuttles for transport. He could 
already see a new era emerging...

A comm message snaps him out of his thoughts, DevilDuer's voice asking him 
what to do with Lady Hawk.

"Don't kill her, no," he replies after apologizing to Panzertron for the 
interruption, "But don't let her stay either. Just politely escort her out."

Zardus looks back at Panzertron, the two bots continuing on the tour.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer nods as he recieves Zardus' orders, looking back at Lady Hawk.

"Nope, ya can't stay," he says, "But your life ain't in danger. I was told to 
escort you out, I hope you cooperate."

He waves his gun dangeroustly, waiting for a reply.
